entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI failure in the test System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DeleteOnClose.OpenOrCreate_DeleteOnClose_UsableAsMutex #60147
  • DllNotFoundException after .NET 5 in-place update #60144
  • [HTTP/3] Http3RequestStream is not properly aborted on finalization #60141
  • Code Cleanup: Remove OSX 10.14 compatibility code #60138
    Future
  • QuicConnection.AcceptStreamAsync throws incorrect exception on browser close #60133
  • BackgroundService that doesn't call base.StartAsync leads to NullReferenceException - .NET 6 breaking change #60131
    6.0.0
  • Will a .net 5 project be able to use AOT feature? #60130
  • Re-enable runtime tests running on Android arm64, when the installation timeout gets fixed #60128
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T> AddRange / InsertRange Overloads #60127
  • Make ImmutableArray.CreateRange<T>(IEnumerable<T>) Thread-safe #60126
  • SignedCms: does not enable RSASSA-PSS signing #60125
    7.0.0
  • Several .NET 5 assemblies are deployed without matching PDBs in MS Symbol Server #60123
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostTests.HostLifetimeOnStartedDelaysStart failed on rolling build #60121
  • [HTTP/3] We don't drain H3 stream after trailing headers #60118
  • The "AppleAppBuilderTask" task failed unexpectedly - CMake Error - add_library cannot create target because another target with the same name already exists. #60115
  • Thread.Priority ignored on Linux? #60114
  • Mono: UnmanagedCallersOnly functions with ref parameters aren't considered blittable by the AOT compiler #60113
  • Output unexpected literal string in MetricsEventSource.ParseSpecs #60110
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow `Console.ReadKey` to parse VT sequences when `ENABLE_VIRTUAL_TERMINAL_INPUT` is set on Windows #60107
  • [API Proposal]: Add BlockingCollection<T>.CompleteAdding(Exception) #60106

Closed

  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames is failing on rolling builds #60119
    7.0.0
  • Missing XmlSerializers.dll in nupkg [Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator] #59139
  • Question how run BenchmarkDotnet #60145
  • Awaiting the cancellation token in a BackgroundService throws an exception. #60122
  • generatelayoutonly without previously building the tests fails due to unrestored assets #60137
  • SampleProfiler incorrectly marks all samples as external code on Windows #45179
    7.0.0
  • Code optimization of Debugger.cs (CoreCLR) #59048
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames failed on release coreclr windows x86 Debug #60097
    7.0.0
  • Linux/arm64: Assertion failed 'assignedInterval->isLocalVar' #60070
  • Can't authorize in asp.net server with kerberos (401) #59983
  • System.Text.Json support for DynamicObject. #31175
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding #59800
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'val->OperIs(GT_IND, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_CNS_INT)' #59871
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `mono-aot-cross` asserts with `function:mono_method_to_ir, VAR 1 (TValue_REF) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations ` #57560
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeZones Test failure #60150
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Limit FileStream DeleteOnClose test to only Unix #60149
    area-System.IO
  • Add support for cloning loops with `<=` conditions #60148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add issue reporting guidelines to CONTRIBUTING.md #60142
    area-Meta
  • Check BackgroundService.ExecuteTask for null #60139
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not strip dotnet.wasm in Debug build #60134
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60132
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Support passing total code size through when doing SPMI diffs #60124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable rundownvalidation runtime test on MonoVM #60117
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [6.0] Port "Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters (#59741)" to 6.0 #60116
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • SafeFileHandle.Unix: don't DeleteOnClose when lock is not succesful. #60112
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Override `corehost_resolve_component_dependencies` and `corehost_set_error_writer` PInvokes in singlefile scenario. #60111
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue with incorrect handling of optimized method layouts #60109
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Fix TimeZones Test failure #60140
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #59767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move more pipelines to scheduled rather than rolling #60099
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dependency of GenerateLayout on RestorePackages #60136
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Correctly Save GC Mode on Suspension on Windows for SampleProfiler #59974
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize code readability in Debugger.cs #60071
    area-System.Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix libcoreclr.so build incompatibilities on Linux #60077
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Use forms in bug report issue template #60129
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid using Uint8Array to set memory content #60087
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/5.0] Additional RPMs for CBL-Mariner #59548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 5.0.x
  • Make field nodes unary #60105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #60095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60053
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Enable host.pkg subset in source-build #60069
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an assert condition for UpperVectorSave/Restore #60108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not check options values if options haven't been initialized in BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding test #60062
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [HTTP/3] Set EOS for 0-length response payload #60120
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove SkipOn NetFramework attributes in System.Reflection.Emit tests #60103
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Don't create a symbols archive in a PGO build. #60096
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Merge src/tests/run.proj into src/tests/build.proj #60098
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add R2RTest support for the perfmap-format-version Crossgen2 option #60002
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add PreciseRefCountsRequired method #60027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix benign assert in gtNewTempAssign #59991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59861
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Show error dialog in single-file app when runtime is missing #60045
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.0
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [WIP] Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #60058
    area-Single-File
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #59989
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Pick up a new build of Xunit #60044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59990
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.0
  • Stop running runtime tests on Android arm64, until the installation timeout gets fixed #59772
    * NO MERGE *
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Unordered floating non-equality comparison #60089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Tests` #57422
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
